info.title: Joint Venture Billing - Read
info.description: The service enables you to retrieve list of billing files generated for a Joint Venture Partner. This list would provide details on key attributes which would be required to fetch attachments using the Attachment Reuse Service.

x-sap-shortText: Retrieve billing files generated in Joint Venture Accounting using the inbound service

values.text: Joint Venture Partner Billing Files Integration(SAP_COM_0381)

get.description:
Billing files for Joint Venture Accounting  
Returns list of billing files generated per company code, fiscal year, period and partner

parameters.name: CompanyCode
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

parameters.name: FiscalYear
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

parameters.name: FiscalPeriod
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

parameters.name: JointVenturePartner
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET AttachmentLinkSet HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--

count.description: The number of entities in the collection. Available when using the [$inlinecount](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=67) query option.

innererror.description: The structure of this object is service-specific

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [Paging - Top](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=66)

skip.name: $skip
skip.description: Skip the first n items, see [Paging - Skip](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)
